src.java.com.infusion.util.event
Interface EventBroker

interface EventBroker

Iterface for defining an event broker - an object to which people subscribe to events and publish events.

Method Summary
EventType getEventType(java.lang.String eventName)

Returns an eventType definition with a given name

void loadConfiguration(EventConfiguration eventConfiguration)

Loads a bunch of config from an eventConfiguration instance

void publish(java.lang.Object event)

Public method - this is the entry point to fire an event.

void publish(java.lang.String eventName, java.lang.Object event)

Internal method for calling an event, looks up notifiers and calls them appropriately.

void registerEventType(EventType eventType)

Registers a new event type

void removeConfiguration(EventConfiguration eventConfiguration)

Removes a bunch of config from an eventConfiguration instance

void removeEventType(EventType eventType)

Removes an event type definition.

void subscribe(java.lang.String eventType, EventConsumer consumer)

This adds an item to the consumers map.

boolean unsubscribe(java.lang.String event, EventConsumer consumer)

Removes a consumer from listening ona given event.

publish

public void publish(java.lang.Object event)
Public method - this is the entry point to fire an event. This class will pick up top-level consumers for the event and use the notifiers to notify lower level events.
param:
event THe event being thrown

publish

public void publish(java.lang.String eventName, java.lang.Object event)
Internal method for calling an event, looks up notifiers and calls them appropriately.
param:
event The original event being fired
param:
eventName Which event class we are currently examining

This adds an item to the consumers map.
param:
eventType The event class this will be fired on
